description: The fingertips of the right hand grasp the Pringles can using a Precision:Pinch grasp, with the thumb and index finger encircling the cylindrical body.
contact_details: The object is grasped by the fingertips of the right hand, with the thumb and index finger forming a pincer grip around the cylindrical body of the can. The middle finger also appears to be in contact, providing additional support.
